title: Corruptionist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose someone to corrupt each night. (2 use, only lose a charge if target is attacked)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When a player is corrupted, all attempts to kill that player **will **succeed for that night only.
- If your target is attacked, their Defense will drop to None, all attacks on the player will bypass any protective effects, all attacks on the player will be Astral, and any other actions needed to ensure that this player will die will be taken.
- Your target will not be notified that they were corrupted unless your target dies as a result of the corruption.
- You have Basic Defense until you are attacked for the first time.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See the good faction lose the game.

desc:
Post 226
*A tiny little man holding your arteries shut. Yeah, that's right, motherfucker, then what?*
